decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design and Access Statement, 1071-001, 1071 - 002, 1071 - 003, 1071 - 004, 1071 - 005, 1071 - 007, 1071 - 008, 1071 - 009, 1071 - 006, 1071 - 012, 1071 - 015, 1071 - 016, 1071 - 017 Received: 12 August 2016 1071 - 010, 1071 - 011, 1071 - 013, 1071 - 014, 1071 - 019 Received: 07 October 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - The windows formed in the side elevation at the first floor level and above shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of part single / part two storey rear extensions, conversion of garage into habitable room, side and rear roof extensions incorporating a front roof window with raising of the roof ridge and eaves and changes to the front boundary wall to the house.
